lang.report_schedule_note: schedule time must be loner than or equal with aggregation level
lang.report_lite_note: lite mode would ignore date with all zero in/out.
lang.report_localtime_note: Represent StartTime, EndTime in camera local time zone with ISO8601 format. Or defaultly in UTC time.
lang.filename_format_note:
support customize report filename format: [default: report_%T.%F]
%T: report timestamp; %M: Mac address; %D: DeviceID; %G: GroupID
%S: Schedule time in second; %A: Aggregation level in second
%N: Server name; %F: report format; %L: LITE or empty
